title: Bug 131928tabs in the sql editor for a dataset break the syntax highlighting for the next keyword
OB: Bug 131928tabs in the sql editor for a dataset break the syntax highlighting for the next keyword if you type in the query like this (where <tab is a press of the tab key)select namefrom user<tabinner join address on address.userid = user.idthe syntax highlighting does not apply the correct colour to the word "inner"if you change the <tab to a space the colour is displayed correctly.
SR: if you type in the query like this (where <tab is a press of the tab key)select namefrom user<tabinner join address on address.userid = user.idthe syntax highlighting does not apply the correct colour to the word "inner"if you change the <tab to a space the colour is displayed correctly.
